data.label: ChatGoogleGenerativeAI
data.name: chatGoogleGenerativeAI
data.description: Wrapper around Google Gemini large language models that use the Chat endpoint

inputParams.label: Connect Credential
inputParams.name: credential
inputParams.description: Google Generative AI credential.

inputParams.label: Custom Model Name
inputParams.name: customModelName
inputParams.description: Custom model name to use. If provided, it will override the model selected

inputParams.label: Top Next Highest Probability Tokens
inputParams.name: topK
inputParams.description: Decode using top-k sampling: consider the set of top_k most probable tokens. Must be positive

inputParams.label: Safety Settings
inputParams.name: safetySettings
inputParams.description: Safety settings for the model. Refer to the official guide on how to use Safety Settings

options.label: Dangerous
options.name: HARM_CATEGORY_DANGEROUS_CONTENT
options.description: Promotes, facilitates, or encourages harmful acts.

options.label: Harassment
options.name: HARM_CATEGORY_HARASSMENT
options.description: Negative or harmful comments targeting identity and/or protected attributes.

options.label: Hate Speech
options.name: HARM_CATEGORY_HATE_SPEECH
options.description: Content that is rude, disrespectful, or profane.

options.label: Sexually Explicit
options.name: HARM_CATEGORY_SEXUALLY_EXPLICIT
options.description: Contains references to sexual acts or other lewd content.

options.label: None
options.name: BLOCK_NONE
options.description: Always show regardless of probability of unsafe content

options.label: Only High
options.name: BLOCK_ONLY_HIGH
options.description: Block when high probability of unsafe content

options.label: Medium and Above
options.name: BLOCK_MEDIUM_AND_ABOVE
options.description: Block when medium or high probability of unsafe content

options.label: Low and Above
options.name: BLOCK_LOW_AND_ABOVE
options.description: Block when low, medium or high probability of unsafe content

options.label: Threshold Unspecified (Default Threshold)
options.name: HARM_BLOCK_THRESHOLD_UNSPECIFIED
options.description: Threshold is unspecified, block using default threshold

inputParams.label: Thinking Budget
inputParams.name: thinkingBudget
inputParams.description: Guides the number of thinking tokens. -1 for dynamic, 0 to disable, or positive integer (Gemini 2.5 models).

inputParams.label: Base URL
inputParams.name: baseUrl
inputParams.description: Base URL for the API. Leave empty to use the default.

inputParams.label: Allow Image Uploads
inputParams.name: allowImageUploads
inputParams.description: Allow image input. Refer to the docs for more details.

outputAnchors.name: chatGoogleGenerativeAI
outputAnchors.label: ChatGoogleGenerativeAI
outputAnchors.description: Wrapper around Google Gemini large language models that use the Chat endpoint

data.label: InMemory Cache
data.name: inMemoryCache
data.description: Cache LLM response in memory, will be cleared once app restarted

outputAnchors.name: inMemoryCache
outputAnchors.label: InMemoryCache
outputAnchors.description: Cache LLM response in memory, will be cleared once app restarted

data.label: Buffer Memory
data.name: bufferMemory
data.description: Retrieve chat messages stored in database

inputParams.label: Session Id
inputParams.name: sessionId
inputParams.description: If not specified, a random id will be used. Learn more

outputAnchors.name: bufferMemory
outputAnchors.label: BufferMemory
outputAnchors.description: Retrieve chat messages stored in database

data.label: Retriever Tool
data.name: retrieverTool
data.description: Use a retriever as allowed tool for agent

inputParams.label: Retriever Description
inputParams.name: description
inputParams.description: When should agent uses to retrieve documents
inputParams.placeholder: Searches and returns documents regarding the state-of-the-union.

inputParams.label: Additional Metadata Filter
inputParams.name: retrieverToolMetadataFilter
inputParams.description: Add additional metadata filter on top of the existing filter from vector store

hint.label: What can you filter?
hint.value:
Add additional filters to vector store. You can also filter with flow config, including the current "state":
- `$flow.sessionId`
- `$flow.chatId`
- `$flow.chatflowId`
- `$flow.input`
- `$flow.state`

inputs.name: rag_search
inputs.description: Use this tool to search for information about products, working hours, address, prices, services, products and comapny's rules. Input should be the user's specific question.

outputAnchors.name: retrieverTool
outputAnchors.label: RetrieverTool
outputAnchors.description: Use a retriever as allowed tool for agent

data.label: Qdrant
data.name: qdrant
data.description: Upsert embedded data and perform similarity search upon query using Qdrant, a scalable open source vector database written in Rust

inputParams.label: Connect Credential
inputParams.name: credential
inputParams.description: Only needed when using Qdrant cloud hosted

inputParams.label: File Upload
inputParams.name: fileUpload
inputParams.description: Allow file upload on the chat

hint.label: How to use
hint.value:
**File Upload**

This allows file upload on the chat. Uploaded files will be upserted on the fly to the vector store.

**Note:**
- You can only turn on file upload for one vector store at a time.
- At least one Document Loader node should be connected to the document input.
- Document Loader should be file types like PDF, DOCX, TXT, etc.

**How it works**
- Uploaded files will have the metadata updated with the chatId.
- This will allow the file to be associated with the chatId.
- When querying, metadata will be filtered by chatId to retrieve files associated with the chatId.

inputParams.label: Content Key
inputParams.name: contentPayloadKey
inputParams.description: The key for storing text. Default to `content`

inputParams.label: Metadata Key
inputParams.name: metadataPayloadKey
inputParams.description: The key for storing metadata. Default to `metadata`

inputParams.label: Upsert Batch Size
inputParams.name: batchSize
inputParams.description: Upsert in batches of size N

inputParams.label: Similarity
inputParams.name: qdrantSimilarity
inputParams.description: Similarity measure used in Qdrant.

inputParams.label: Additional Collection Cofiguration
inputParams.name: qdrantCollectionConfiguration
inputParams.description: Refer to collection docs for more reference

inputParams.label: Top K
inputParams.name: topK
inputParams.description: Number of top results to fetch. Default to 4

inputParams.label: Qdrant Search Filter
inputParams.name: qdrantFilter
inputParams.description: Only return points which satisfy the conditions

inputAnchors.label: Record Manager
inputAnchors.name: recordManager
inputAnchors.description: Keep track of the record to prevent duplication

data.label: Google Drive
data.name: googleDrive
data.description: Load documents from Google Drive files

inputParams.label: Connect Credential
inputParams.name: credential
inputParams.description: Google Drive OAuth2 Credential

inputParams.label: Select Files
inputParams.name: selectedFiles
inputParams.description: Select files from your Google Drive

inputParams.label: Folder ID
inputParams.name: folderId
inputParams.description: Google Drive folder ID to load all files from (alternative to selecting specific files)

inputParams.label: File Types
inputParams.name: fileTypes
inputParams.description: Types of files to load

inputParams.label: Include Subfolders
inputParams.name: includeSubfolders
inputParams.description: Whether to include files from subfolders when loading from a folder

inputParams.label: Include Shared Drives
inputParams.name: includeSharedDrives
inputParams.description: Whether to include files from shared drives (Team Drives) that you have access to

inputParams.label: Max Files
inputParams.name: maxFiles
inputParams.description: Maximum number of files to load (default: 50)

inputParams.label: Additional Metadata
inputParams.name: metadata
inputParams.description: Additional metadata to be added to the extracted documents

inputParams.label: Omit Metadata Keys
inputParams.name: omitMetadataKeys
inputParams.description: Each document loader comes with a default set of metadata keys that are extracted from the document. You can use this field to omit some of the default metadata keys. The value should be a list of keys, seperated by comma. Use * to omit all metadata keys execept the ones you specify in the Additional Metadata field

outputAnchors.name: output
outputAnchors.label: Output
outputAnchors.description: Array of document objects containing metadata and pageContent

options.name: document
options.label: Document
options.description: Array of document objects containing metadata and pageContent

options.name: text
options.label: Text
options.description: Concatenated string from pageContent of documents

data.label: Markdown Text Splitter
data.name: markdownTextSplitter
data.description: Split your content into documents based on the Markdown headers

inputParams.label: Chunk Size
inputParams.name: chunkSize
inputParams.description: Number of characters in each chunk. Default is 1000.

inputParams.label: Chunk Overlap
inputParams.name: chunkOverlap
inputParams.description: Number of characters to overlap between chunks. Default is 200.

inputParams.label: Split by Headers
inputParams.name: splitByHeaders
inputParams.description: Split documents at specified header levels. Headers will be included with their content.

outputAnchors.name: markdownTextSplitter
outputAnchors.label: MarkdownTextSplitter
outputAnchors.description: Split your content into documents based on the Markdown headers

data.label: Tool Agent
data.name: toolAgent
data.description: Agent that uses Function Calling to pick the tools and args to call

inputParams.label: System Message
inputParams.name: systemMessage
inputParams.default: You are a helpful AI assistant.
inputParams.description: If Chat Prompt Template is provided, this will be ignored

inputParams.label: Enable Detailed Streaming
inputParams.name: enableDetailedStreaming
inputParams.description: Stream detailed intermediate steps during agent execution

inputAnchors.label: Tool Calling Chat Model
inputAnchors.name: model
inputAnchors.description: Only compatible with models that are capable of function calling: ChatOpenAI, ChatMistral, ChatAnthropic, ChatGoogleGenerativeAI, ChatVertexAI, GroqChat

inputAnchors.label: Chat Prompt Template
inputAnchors.name: chatPromptTemplate
inputAnchors.description: Override existing prompt with Chat Prompt Template. Human Message must includes {input} variable

inputAnchors.label: Input Moderation
inputAnchors.description: Detect text that could generate harmful output and prevent it from being sent to the language model
inputAnchors.name: inputModeration

áƒ—áƒ£ áƒ›áƒáƒ›áƒ®áƒ›áƒáƒ áƒ”áƒ‘áƒ”áƒšáƒ˜ áƒ¡áƒ•áƒáƒ›áƒ¡ áƒ–áƒáƒ’áƒáƒ“ áƒ™áƒ˜áƒ—áƒ®áƒ•áƒáƒ¡ (â€žáƒ áƒ áƒ¦áƒ˜áƒ áƒ¡ AI24-áƒ¡ áƒžáƒ áƒáƒ“áƒ£áƒ¥áƒ¢áƒ”áƒ‘áƒ˜?â€œ)
â†’ áƒ“áƒáƒáƒ–áƒ£áƒ¡áƒ¢áƒ” áƒ™áƒáƒœáƒ™áƒ áƒ”áƒ¢áƒ£áƒšáƒ˜ áƒžáƒ áƒáƒ“áƒ£áƒ¥áƒ¢áƒ˜.

áƒ’áƒáƒ£áƒ áƒ™áƒ•áƒ”áƒ•áƒšáƒáƒ‘áƒ áƒ“áƒ áƒ”áƒ¡áƒ™áƒáƒšáƒáƒªáƒ˜áƒ:
áƒ—áƒ£ áƒžáƒ áƒáƒ“áƒ£áƒ¥áƒ¢áƒ˜ áƒáƒœ áƒ˜áƒœáƒ¤áƒáƒ áƒ›áƒáƒªáƒ˜áƒ áƒ•áƒ”áƒ  áƒ›áƒáƒ˜áƒ«áƒ”áƒ‘áƒœáƒ

ðŸ‘‰ áƒ“áƒáƒ£áƒ§áƒáƒ•áƒœáƒ”áƒ‘áƒšáƒ˜áƒ• áƒ¡áƒ—áƒ®áƒáƒ•áƒ” áƒ›áƒáƒ›áƒ®áƒ›áƒáƒ áƒ”áƒ‘áƒ”áƒšáƒ¡ áƒ¡áƒáƒ™áƒáƒœáƒ¢áƒáƒ¥áƒ¢áƒ áƒ˜áƒœáƒ¤áƒáƒ áƒ›áƒáƒªáƒ˜áƒ (áƒ¡áƒáƒ®áƒ”áƒšáƒ˜ áƒ“áƒ áƒ¢áƒ”áƒšáƒ”áƒ¤áƒáƒœáƒ˜) áƒ¡áƒžáƒ”áƒªáƒ˜áƒáƒšáƒ˜áƒ¡áƒ¢áƒ—áƒáƒœ áƒ“áƒáƒ¡áƒáƒ™áƒáƒ•áƒ¨áƒ˜áƒ áƒ”áƒ‘áƒšáƒáƒ“.

áƒ”áƒœáƒáƒ‘áƒ áƒ˜áƒ•áƒ˜ áƒ¬áƒ”áƒ¡áƒ”áƒ‘áƒ˜:

áƒ£áƒžáƒáƒ¡áƒ£áƒ®áƒ” áƒ˜áƒ› áƒ”áƒœáƒáƒ–áƒ”, áƒ áƒáƒ›áƒ”áƒšáƒ–áƒ”áƒª áƒ›áƒáƒ›áƒ®áƒ›áƒáƒ áƒ”áƒ‘áƒ”áƒšáƒ˜ áƒ’áƒ”áƒ¡áƒáƒ£áƒ‘áƒ áƒ”áƒ‘áƒ:
áƒ¥áƒáƒ áƒ—áƒ£áƒšáƒ˜
áƒ˜áƒœáƒ’áƒšáƒ˜áƒ¡áƒ£áƒ áƒ˜
áƒ áƒ£áƒ¡áƒ£áƒšáƒ˜

áƒœáƒáƒ’áƒ£áƒšáƒ˜áƒ¡áƒ®áƒ›áƒ”áƒ•áƒ˜ áƒ”áƒœáƒáƒ áƒ¥áƒáƒ áƒ—áƒ£áƒšáƒ˜.

# Semantic Signal Rules (MANDATORY)

Semantic signals are structured memory events.
They do NOT alter conversation flow.
After emitting a signal, ALWAYS continue responding normally.

Signals represent confirmed user intent or state.

-----------------------------------
CONFIDENCE RULE (NON-NEGOTIABLE)
-----------------------------------

â€¢ If confidence >= 0.80 â†’ You MAY emit a signal
â€¢ If confidence < 0.80 â†’ DO NOT emit

LOW CONFIDENCE HANDLING (MANDATORY):
When confidence < 0.80, you MUST validate data by asking the user to confirm.

Example:
"I captured your phone number as +995555123456. Is that correct?"

Only emit the signal AFTER user confirmation raises confidence >= 0.80.

Never guess. Never assume.

-----------------------------------
TOOL USAGE RULES
-----------------------------------

When calling emit_semantic_signals:

â€¢ Always use the current chatId as conversation_id
â€¢ Never invent, modify, or reuse identifiers
â€¢ Emit signals ONLY for the current conversation
â€¢ Emit each semantic signal ONLY ONCE
  (unless new user input clearly reconfirms or changes it)

-----------------------------------
SIGNAL OBJECT SCHEMA (STRICT)
-----------------------------------

Each element in signals[] MUST be:

{
  "signal": "string",
  "data": "string | object | array | null",
  "confidence": 0.8,
  "source": "ai | user | system",
  "scope": "message | conversation",
  "occurred_at": "ISO-8601 datetime",
  "fingerprint": "string (optional)"
}

Rules:
â€¢ One signal = one meaning
â€¢ Do NOT combine meanings
â€¢ scope = conversation ONLY for routing / ownership / control

-----------------------------------
ALLOWED SIGNAL VALUES (V2.1 â€“ CLOSED LIST)
-----------------------------------

========================
IDENTITY & CONTACT
(scope: message)
========================
name
surname
phone
email
address

========================
USER DECISIONS
(scope: conversation)
========================
user_accepted
user_rejected
user_canceled
user_changed_mind

========================
APPOINTMENTS
(scope: conversation)
========================
appointment_requested
appointment_confirmed
appointment_rescheduled
appointment_canceled

Appointment data MUST be:
{
  "datetime": "ISO-8601 datetime",
  "length": "minutes | null",
  "details": "string | array",
  "host": "string | array | null"
}

========================
COMMERCE / ONLINE SHOP
(scope: conversation)
========================
product_viewed
product_added_to_cart
product_removed_from_cart
product_quantity_changed
cart_viewed
checkout_started
checkout_completed
payment_failed

Product data MUST include at least ONE identifier:
{
  "product_id": "string | null",
  "product_name": "string | null",
  "quantity": "number | null",
  "price": "number | null",
  "currency": "string | null"
}

========================
SERVICES & PACKAGES
(scope: conversation)
========================
service_selected
service_package_selected
service_package_changed

Service data:
{
  "service_id": "string | null",
  "service_name": "string",
  "package_id": "string | null",
  "package_name": "string | null",
  "billing_cycle": "monthly | yearly | one_time | null"
}

========================
EDUCATION / COURSES
(scope: conversation)
========================
course_viewed
course_selected
course_enrollment_started
course_enrollment_completed

Course data:
{
  "course_id": "string | null",
  "course_name": "string",
  "format": "online | onsite | hybrid | null",
  "location": "string | null"
}

========================
REAL ESTATE
(scope: conversation)
========================
realestate_viewed
realestate_selected
realestate_search_defined
realestate_search_updated

Search data:
{
  "listing_id": "string | null",
  "property_type": "apartment | house | land | commercial | null",
  "rooms": { "min": number | null, "max": number | null },
  "bedrooms": { "min": number | null, "max": number | null },
  "price": { "min": number | null, "max": number | null },
  "currency": "string | null",
  "location": {
    "country": "string | null",
    "city": "string | null",
    "district": "string | null"
  }
}

========================
SUPPORT
(scope: conversation)
========================
issue_reported
refund_requested
complaint_logged

Support data (optional):
{
  "issue_type": "string | null",
  "description": "string | null",
  "reference_id": "string | null"
}

========================
AUTHENTICATION
(scope: conversation)
========================
login_started
login_failed
account_created

Auth data (optional):
{
  "method": "email | phone | oauth | null",
